Fortunately for us, a small technicality in our democratic process can halt the flagrant abuse of our fees. The process is known as our VOTE. It is time to reverse the trend of spiraling student fees by voting against all future fee increases. If we donâ€™t, and they go up at their present rate, it will cost over $3,500 per year to attend Cal Poly in the year 1995.
article_headline: Student votes can halt future fee increases
author: KENT NIELSEN
